_______________________________________________________________________


This is a FLAC rip of the "best" interpretation of Shostakovich' String Quartets by the Borodin String Quartet. A rare collectors item with an out-of-this-world intense high quality recording (St. Jude's Church in London), where you can even hear the players breathe.

_______________________________________________________________________


Dmitry Shostakovich (1906-1975)

- String Quartet No. 8 in C minor op. 110
- String Quartet No. 7 in F sharp minor op. 108
- String Quartet No. 3 in F major op. 73

Borodin String Quartet

- Mikhail Kopelman (violin)
- Andrei Abramenkov (violin)
- Dmitri Shebalin (viola)
- Valentin Berlinsky (cello)
